title: Update login copy and rebrand 'Inner Circle' to 'CloseCircle'

requirements.summary: Update the public login screen primary auth button copy to a calmer, more emotional 'Log in' phrase and align the loading label with the new wording.
acceptanceCriteria: On the login screen, the primary auth button no longer displays the exact text "Sign in with Internet Identity".
While login is in progress, the button's loading label matches the new copy style (no mismatched "Signing in..." if the button now says "Log in").

file_operations.description: Update the primary login button label to a calmer, more emotional phrase centered on "Log in" (e.g., "Log in to your safe space"), and update the loading-state label to match the new copy style (e.g., "Logging you in...") so it no longer uses "Signing in...".

requirements.summary: Replace all user-facing app name text 'Inner Circle' with 'CloseCircle' across the frontend UI, including login branding and the in-app header.
acceptanceCriteria: The login screen title shows "CloseCircle" instead of "Inner Circle".
The authenticated app header shows "CloseCircle" instead of "Inner Circle".
No user-facing UI text anywhere in the frontend displays the exact string "Inner Circle".

file_operations.description: Create a single source of truth for user-facing branding text (e.g., export an APP_NAME constant set to "CloseCircle") to prevent future reintroductions of the string "Inner Circle".
Replace the login screen branding header text "Inner Circle" with "CloseCircle" by using the shared branding constant from frontend/src/constants/branding.ts.
Replace the in-app header branding text "Inner Circle" with "CloseCircle" by using the shared branding constant from frontend/src/constants/branding.ts.
